amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 504, the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 117-8, modified by Rules Committee Print 117-9 and the amendment printed in Part B of House Report 117-74 is considered adopted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
